Description:
Titled land - Plethora of Potential!
Located in the highly popular Northside, Timbertop Estate is a rare 740sqm block on offer! With a plethora of potential, you can build your dream home and have enough room for a great back yard and even a pool. With an unbeatable position, generous block size and opposite a park you can't ask for more! A guaranteed investment, and a savvy move for anyone wanting to enter the market.
Close proximity to Beaconsfield Town, Berwick Village, Fountain Gate shopping centre, prestigious schools, D'Angelos Winery, public transport, freeway access, sports and medical facilities.
Take advantage of this rare opportunity and call today!

Address: Lot 2 PS740989N 90 Rix Road Officer VIC 3809
Description:
Prime Development Potential
Over 12 acres of prime development potential, located in the much sought after Officer Residential precinct in one of the quickest growth corridors in the whole of Victoria. This amazing opportunity on approximately 12.7 acres has so much to offer. Take advantage of this land being next to proposed community centres, schools and neighbourhood activity centre. Officer is now one of the most attractive suburbs in the south east region, with great access to the train station and local shops & cafes. The proposed subdivision has drawings of over 100 lots and its neighboring properties are advanced having been completed, sold and occupied. Developers get excited this is your time to shine and take the next step. Expressions of Interest on this land will finish at 4pm on Friday the 22nd June 2018. Call or email asap for more information on this fantastic opportunity

Description:
UNIQUE AND IMPRESSIVE
Arriving at this property you see the quality and attention to detail the minute you walk through the door. Architecturally designed and a bespoke build provides a flowing floorplan with high quality luxury fixtures and fittings. With polished concrete floors, new carpets, stone benches through-out, feature pendant lighting, feature walls, a palate of crisp white, polished concrete and touches of solid wood gives this home a wow factor. 33msq of living with 4 big bedrooms, 2 living areas, study, alfresco with built in kitchen, and a butler's pantry. This home is ideal for any growing family.
- Master bedroom with ensuite and large walk in robes that are fully fitted with bespoke cabinetry.
- 3 large bedrooms and a family bathroom with a free standing stone bath and feature lighting
- Open plan kitchen, dining and family room with tri sliding doors to the alfresco.
- High gloss white kitchen with ample cupboard space, glass splash back and induction hob
- Double 600mm oven
- 1200 wide by 3100 long island unit with stone bench top and ample cupboard space on both sides of the island unit.
- Butler's pantry with gloss white cabinets.
- Large family dining area with feature lighting and tri sliding doors to the alfresco
- Large family living area with bespoke solid timber TV unit and tri sliding doors to the alfresco
- Media room with projector, screen and surround sound Theatre System
- Study with built in high gloss cabinets and solid timber bench
- Powder room with feature walls
- Alfresco with spotted gum deck and built in outdoor kitchen and BBQ with gas connection, the alfresco has a feature Tasmanian oak ceiling and fan
- Internal access to the double garage with automatic door
- Ducted heating, refrigerated cooling and ducted vacuum
- Landscaped garden with plenty of room for the kids and pets to play
-
It is ideally located in the new development of Grandvue Estate, Officer with sweeping views, close to shops, school, public transport and freeway access. The photos do not do this property justice. This is a unique property and viewing is a must to appreciate the sense of style, space and luxury throughout this bespoke home.
Insights: 22 Avondale Street, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Super Smart Purchase
A perfect package for the FIRST HOME BUYER, DOWNSIZER or INVESTOR! Brilliantly located in the growth corridor close to the Officer railway station, this near new home would suit the first home buyer, downsizer or investor. Featuring three bedrooms, the master offers an ensuite and walk-in robe; both bathrooms have double basins. The kitchen is the central hub of the home with walk-in pantry and loads of counter space; this area overlooks the light filled family meals area and outdoors to the entertainer's courtyard. Offering ducted heating and a split system in the family room. Close to parkland and some of the best schools in the south east corridor. Featuring a double garage, with access from the rear laneway and internal access. This lovely contemporary property has oodles of appeal!

Description:
Modern Three-Bedroom Home with Deck and Pergola
This ultra-modern and stylish home fantastically situated near parklands of the Potters Grove Estate, is sure to tick all the boxes for first home buyers, downsizers and investors alike. Offering a great floor plan that allows for easy living, the home consists of three spacious bedrooms, two bathrooms, a single car lock-up garage, open plan dining, kitchen and living.
What makes this property stand out from the rest, is the fantastic outdoor entertaining area which boasts a spacious decking area with pergola, leading to the low-maintenance backyard with freshly laid turf grass. Not only this, the home also features ducted heating throughout, a split system, stainless steel appliances and ample bench space in the kitchen.
Furthermore, you are conveniently located within close proximity to shops, freeway access, public transport and great schools – contact Jack on 0468 958 463 for further information.

Description:
You’ve hit a hole in ONE with this!!!
Perfectly presented and only 6 years Old!
This great home design will weave its magic on you. The features of this home include everything you could think of such as a centrally located contemporary kitchen featuring plenty of cupboards, stone benchtops, a large oven/cooktop, dishwasher, walk through pantry, along with a family and dining room that opens out onto a large outdoor entertaining area.
The private master bedroom at the front of the home features an ensuite and walk-in-robe while the 3 remaining bedrooms feature built-in-robes and can be found tucked away at the back of the house. The home also contains a separate sitting room near the front entrance.
Live in absolute comfort with the thoughtful touches and stylish inclusions which make this house a home.
Other features include, bamboo wood flooring, ducted heating, split system cooling, double remote garage with internal and external access.
Situated seconds away from the Arena Shopping Centre in Officer, the extremely popular St. Francis Xavier College, St. Claire’s primary school, easy access to the Cardinia train station and various bus stops, as well as all major arterial roads including the Princes Highway.

Description:
SOPHISTICATED LIVING
This stunning property will attract the most discerning buyer, located in the ever sought after Arena estate, in close proximity to public transport, an extensive range of quality schools both private and public, Arena shopping hub for convenient shopping as well as all other desired amenities and services.
Every inch of this lovely property has been styled and appointed to perfection, from the striking facade to the superb interior. The most professional stylist would find it difficult to fault. The family friendly floor plan boasts downstairs master suite with ensuite and walk in robes, designer stone kitchen adjacent to dining and family room making the most of open plan living. A separate lounge/theatre room offers a cosy, intimate setting while the upstairs retreat has been designed for the younger family members to enjoy. The secondary rooms are all generous in size with walk in robes to two of them and the study area completes the comfortable living spaces.
Desirable Features include ducted heating, evaporate cooling, S/S , double remote garage with direct entry, two balconies with stacker doors to open and enjoy a quiet cuppa on a summer morning or a beverage of choice in the evening.
Outdoors blends seamlessly with indoors opening out to the decked al fresco complete with spa, outdoor kitchen and meticulous, manicured gardens making for a picturesque, private setting that will be the envy of all.
So if low maintenance, sophisticated living in a six star energy efficient home is what you have been looking for, look no further. Contact Jeanine on 0438 332 411.

Description:
Brand New in Bickleighvale
In the highly sought Rise Estate you will find this stunning example of a brand new “Olah” home, all the work has been done for you and all you have to do is move in and enjoy. Entering the home the quality is evident with beautiful floorboards flowing throughout the home, the entranceway leads you through to the open plan living areas and deluxe chefs kitchen with stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances and a walk in pantry. The well thought out floor plan has the master bedroom to the rear of the home complete with a modern full ensuite and walk-in robe. The 2 other sizeable bedrooms both have built in robes and share a central bathroom complete with stone benchtops and basin. To the front of the home a room that has a multitude of uses including living area, 4th bedroom or dedicated study, the choice is yours. Complete with a double garage, ducted heating, and conveniently located with close proximity to shops, schools, cafe’s, parks and public transport this home won’t last long.

Description:
QUIET LOCATION IN OFFICER
This 7 year old Metricon house is as good as new. With freshly painted walls, light ceramic tiles, Caeser stone benches, feature pendant lighting and down lights, open plan kitchen, dining and living area, it oozes style and elegance. The property is immaculately presented and has an ideal floorplan for any growing family.
- Open plan kitchen, with 900mm S/S cooker, all S/S appliances
- Caeser stone benches and breakfast bar, glass splash back
- Dining area with feature wall
- Large living area with solid wooden tri stacker doors opening to the alfresco
- Master ensuite WIR with doors leading to the alfresco
- 2 large bedrooms with BIR
- Family bathroom, separate WC
- Well- appointed laundry
- Ducted heating, split system cooling.
- Internal access to the double garage
- Mature garden, feature wall with decretive wall art
- Decked alfresco with ceiling fan
- Built in BBQ area with storage and wooden seating area
With Officer shopping plaza on your doorstep and close to excellent schools, Officer train station and freeway access it makes this a great family house.

Description:
Pretty as a a Picture
This beautiful young Metricon home has been lovingly maintained and you can tell that as soon as you step inside!
At the entrance you are greeted with a generous formal lounge on the left, to the right you'll find double doors to the very spacious master, including a big WIR and your own private ensuite. Through to the rear of the home you will find the well appointed hostess kitchen, with 900ml upright stove/oven, dishwasher, microwave cavity and a walk in pantry large enough to keep the family chef very happy.
Be comfortable all year round with split system cooling to the family living zone and ducted heating throughout. The central bathroom and separate toilet service the remaining 2 bedrooms which both have large built in robes with sliding doors. For the entertainers the stratco pergola area is a welcoming space complete with merbau decking and plenty of power points to fit out any party you can imagine! The green thumbs will have space to grow their own organic veggies and plants in the greenhouse. Got kids or pets? You'll also have space for them to run around and even put up a swing set too!
Other inclusions are gutter guards, secure gates to the yard, double remote control garage with internal access, electric roller shutters on 4 windows, fly screens and security doors, solar assist hot water and grey water taps! Situated nice and close to Cardinia Road train station (1.5km approx.), and with easy access to the M1 Freeway, walking tracks and parklands close by and Club Officer. Be quick, homes this nice don't last long!
All information contained herein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.

Description:
Prestigious Living - Offering a Lifestyle
Showcasing an outstanding property that will leave a lasting impression! This remarkable two storey Arden home is the definitive in ultra-modern living, in Cardinia Shire's premier Timbertop estate.
With 39sqs under the roofline this expansive home will appeal to families of all sizes. On the ground level you are welcomed through into the light filled entry, where you will also find the grand master bedroom with huge walk in robe and ensuite with twin vanities, extra-large shower and quality accessories. Further along, is the heart of the home boasting open plan living, including hostess kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances, plenty of bench, cupboard space and a huge walk in pantry and so much more to be excited about! The living & dining along with the home theatre areas complete the extravagant zone for indoor pleasures, but black framed sliding doors open up and allow you to expand out to the outdoor paved area and backyard, perfect for entertaining!
On the second floor you will find 4 generous sized bedrooms, all featuring walk in robes of which 2 share an ensuite. With the remaining 2 bedrooms being serviced by a convenient main bathroom. You will also find another massive upstairs retreat, and the open study.
Complete with ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double car garage with internal access, quality window furnishings, and established gardens. This home has been built and designed to the highest standard and includes plenty of extras from top to bottom!
With a fantastic location close to all amenities this two and a half year old home is move in ready, and definitely won't be available for long, so be sure not to miss out on all the benefits this prestigious property has to offer.

Description:
Titled In The Rise
Create something special on this 517m2 approx. rectangular, level surfaced, prime piece of real estate, enviably situated in Officer’s most in-demand, The Rise Estate within minutes’ drive from elite schools, freeway access, Arena Shopping Center and the trendy eateries and shops of Beaconsfield. Positioned among attractive, established homes with a 16m frontage, overlooking a grassy reserve to enjoy, this family friendly locale close to all amenities is the prime opportunity to construct your dream home. An opportunity not to be missed – call today for further details.
